title: Renewable Portfolio Standard (RPS) Compliance
description: A compliance manager for a load-serving entity needs to file an annual report demonstrating compliance with the state's RPS.

tasks.description: Calculate the total retail electricity sales for the past year to determine the total RPS obligation (e.g., 30% of sales).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the required number of Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs).

tasks.description: Retrieve all RECs owned by the company from the REC tracking registry.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a list of all owned RECs.

tasks.description: Compare the owned RECs to the obligation and purchase any shortfall on the spot market.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a 5% shortfall and executes a purchase to cover it.

tasks.description: Retire the required number of RECs and generate the compliance report for the state regulator.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retires the RECs and generates the formal report.
